original: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nahetu dhammo uppajjati
hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nahetu
dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
nahetu ca naanidassanasappaṭigho nahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanahetu dhammo
uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho
nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
nasanidassanasappaṭigho nanahetu ca naanidassanasappaṭigho nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti
